column4: is it possible to shutdown an ubuntu desktop 9.04 remotely via ssh?
use ssh with keys, and append the command you want to give
if I run 'sudo shutdown now' it looks like its shutting down, but then a text based menu appears on the screen with options like resume restart..
the key is -h for 'halt' (analogue to /sbin/init 6 as tyler_d mentioned)
